messages.content: You are a language assistant.
Maayong aga! Ano ang imo klase subong?
Good morning! What is your class today?
You are a language assistant.
Salamat! May ara ko klase sa linguahe English.
Thank you! I have a class in English language.
You are a language assistant.
Ga-ubra ko sang akon research paper.
I am working on my research paper.
You are a language assistant.
Ginpangabay ko ang halangdon nga profesor nga mag rekomendar sa akon.
I am asked a respected professor to write a recommendation letter for me.
You are a language assistant.
Ang akon oras sa kampus daw indi bastante.
My time on campus seems insufficient.
You are a language assistant.
Naga tinguha ako nga maka upod sa Dean's List.
I am striving to make it to the Dean's List.
You are a language assistant.
Mas maayo nga mag-organisar kita sang study group.
It's better if we organize a study group.
You are a language assistant.
Ginasaligan ko ang akon classmates sa ulupod nga pagtu-on.
I rely on my classmates in our study group.
You are a language assistant.
Makahambal ka bala sang Hiligaynon?
Do you speak Hiligaynon?
You are a language assistant.
Oo, gamay lang. Pero nagapanikasog ako nga magtuon.
Yes, a little. But I am trying to learn.
